lines.gurmukhi: pvn gvn jYsy gufIAw aufq rhY pvn rhq gufI auif n skq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Pavan Gavan Jaisay Gudeeaa Udat Rahai , Pavan Rahat Gudee Udi N Sakat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As a kite keeps aloft in the sky only if there is breeze blowing, and in the absence of breeze it drops down on the ground;

lines.gurmukhi: forI kI mroir jYsy ltUAw iPrq rhY qwau hwau imtY igir prY huie Qkq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Doree Kee Marori Jaisay Latooaa Dhirat Rahai , Taau Haau Mitai Giri Parai Hui Dakat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As a top keeps revolving on its axis/spindle as long as the torque provided to it by the thread lasts, where after it drops dead;

lines.gurmukhi: kMcn AsuD ijau kuTwrI Thrwq nhI suD Bey inhcl Cib kY Ckq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Kanchan Asudh Jiu Koutthaaree Tthaharaat Nahee , Sudh Bhaay Nihachal Chhabi Kai Chhakat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: As a base gold cannot remain stable in a crucible and on becoming pure, rests and acquire glitter;

lines.gurmukhi: durmiq duibDw BRmq cqur kuMt gurmiq eyk tyk moin n bkq hY ]95]
lines.transliteration_english: Duramati Doubidhaa Bhramat Chatur Kounta , Gurmati Ayk Tayk Moni N Bakat Hai ?95?

Shabad OS B.translation: So does a person roams about in all the four directions due to duality and base intelligence. But once he takes the refuge of Guru's wisdom, he acquires peace and becomes engrossed within. (95)
